original.analysis_summary: The resume demonstrates a solid technical foundation and relevant projects for a fresher but misses critical data analytics tools and libraries, which impacts job relevance. ATS compatibility is good but can be enhanced with consistent formatting and clearer section headers.

improved.resume_text:
MAHIMA MALHOTRA  
mahima28.malhotra@gmail.com | 9899829190 | New Delhi  

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Fresher with foundational knowledge in Python (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib & Seaborn), Advanced SQL, and Advanced Excel (Power Query, Data Transformation). Completed projects in deep learning and data visualization, seeking to leverage analytical and technical skills in a Data Analytics role.

TECHNICAL SKILLS  
• Programming & Languages: Python (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn), Advanced SQL (CTEs, Window Functions, Stored Procedures)  
• Database Management: SQL  
• Data Visualization & BI: Power BI, Advanced Excel (Power Query, Data Transformation)  
• Soft Skills: Teamwork, Critical Thinking, Analytical Skills, Fast Learner  
• Other Tools: Jupyter Notebook, MATLAB, AutoCad, Eclipse IDE  

EDUCATION  
B.Tech in Instrumentation and Control Engineering  
Bharati Vidyapeeth’s College of Engineering, New Delhi | GGSIPU | 2016-2020 | 82.9%  

PROJECTS  
Pneumonia detection from Chest X-ray images using Deep Learning  
- Developed a deep learning model for image classification to detect pneumonia from chest X-ray images.  
- Utilized convolutional neural networks (CNN) for feature extraction and classification.  
- Applied Python libraries and frameworks for model training and evaluation.  

E-com Orders  
- Analyzed e-commerce order data to create interactive dashboards using Power BI.  
- Focused on sales trends, customer segmentation, and key performance indicators to drive business insights.  
- Employed data cleaning, DAX functions, and report creation techniques.  

National Air Quality  
- Performed data cleaning and transformation on national air quality datasets using Excel and Power Query.  
- Conducted univariate and bivariate analysis to identify pollution patterns.  
- Applied advanced Excel operations for data manipulation and visualization.  

CERTIFICATIONS  
Certification in Industrial Instrumentation – Indian Oil Corporation Limited  
Certification in JAVA – Coding Ninjas  
Certification in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence – Eckovation  
Certification for Event Coordinator – Industrial Society for Automation  
Data Analytics | Coding Ninjas | 2026
